Chat

Hello! I have a problem using your chatbot. We recently started implementing your support system, but something is not working. How can this situation be resolved?

Chat

We greet you! Thank you for your contact. We apologize for the difficulties encountered. To resolve problems with the chat below, please provide more detailed information about the problem you are experiencing. We are ready to help you!

Chat

Good afternoon I tried to follow your tutorials, but I was having difficulty with some of the topics. Could you provide additional materials or tips?

Chat

Good afternoon Thank you for your inquiry. We are ready to provide you with additional training materials. Please clarify which specific topics you are having difficulty with so that we can offer the best support.
